nodes.text: An aerial circus traveled around the Messert system. The human Seftin Vanik operated as a stunt pilot for the circus before being recruited into the Resistance by one of their pilots, Poe Dameron.
The aerial circus was created as part of the backstory for Seftin Vanik in the 2019 reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
